I just took a look at this, and it seems like this would make it difficult to call post hooks with the inputs (from torch/csrc/autograd/engine.cpp:230:

  auto& fn = *task.fn;
  auto inputs = call_pre_hooks(fn, InputBuffer::variables(std::move(task.inputs)));

  if(!task.base->keep_graph) {
    fn.will_release_variables();
  }
  auto outputs = fn(inputs); // move here?

  return call_post_hooks(fn, std::move(outputs), std::move(inputs));
}
